Parameters
manager
LuaManager*

A pointer to the <LuaManager> handling the Lua state

filename
const std::string&

The name of the file containing the Lua handler functions

matcher
const std::string&

The name of the Lua function handling input matching

action
const std::string&

The name of the Lua function doing the action
